Subject: Important Update: Your Account Security
Body: Dear customer, We have noticed some suspicious activity on your account. Please click on the following link to verify your identity and secure your account.

Subject: Your Invoice Payment Confirmation
Body: Dear [Recipient Name], We are pleased to inform you that your invoice payment has been successfully processed. Attached is the payment confirmation for your reference. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your business. Best regards, [Your Company]

Subject: Urgent: Account Verification Required
Body: Dear Customer, Your account is due for verification. Failure to verify your account may result in suspension. Click on the link below to verify your account now. Thank you. Regards, Customer Support

Subject: Congratulations! You've won a prize!
Body: Dear recipient, Congratulations! You've been selected as the winner of our latest prize draw. Please provide your personal information to claim your prize. Regards, Prize Draw Team

Subject: Security Alert: Unusual Login Attempt Detected
Body: Dear [Recipient Name], We detected an unusual login attempt on your account. If this was not you, please click the link below to secure your account. Regards, Security Team

Subject: Action Required: Password Reset
Body: Dear customer, Due to recent security concerns, we require you to reset your password. Please follow the instructions on the link below to reset your password. Regards, Customer Support

Subject: Confirmation of Appointment
Body: Dear [Recipient Name], This is to confirm your appointment on [Date] at [Time]. Please let us know if you need to reschedule. Regards, [Your Company]

Subject: "Your Amazon Order Confirmation
Body: Dear Customer, Thank you for your order. Your order has been successfully placed. Attached is your order confirmation for your reference. If you have any questions, please contact us. Regards, Amazon Customer Service

Subject: URGENT: Immediate Action Required!
Body: Dear account holder, Immediate action is required on your account. Click the link below to resolve the issue. Regards, Account Services

Subject: Important Update: Policy Changes
Body: Dear [Recipient Name], We would like to inform you about the recent changes to our policies. Please review the attached document for details. Regards, [Your Company]

Subject: Click the link for a free prize
Body: YOU WON!!! Click the link below to claim your free new TV!

Subject: Happy Birthday from grandma
Body: happy birthday grandson! I hope you have fun on your special day today we love you lots!
